author: fapeeler
msg: -removed duplicate code on adding user, handled by Linux.pm
Changed Linux.pm to use host command for finding hostname, ipcalc is not consistent across OS's
Removed some debug statments to reduce output on connection method hash

author: mbautin
msg: [master] Do not kill inaccessible regionservers at startup

Summary: Factoring out the part of the master failover diff D2085 for reading a snapshot of the set of live regionservers from ZK. This should solve the problem of rack switch failure on a rack containing the master, when the secondary master comes up, tries to reach regionservers on the inaccessible rack, and decides that they are dead. When the rack switch comes back, the regionservers on that rack get YouAreDeadException. With this change, the regionservers on the inaccessible rack would not be considered dead until their znodes expire.
